description.value: The Kallas Devil has a vengeful streak and has the ability to infect wells and water supplies in Riverton with sewer haze. She can infect the water supply [[/br 1d6 #Days]]{1d6 days} after the Festival of the Skinned Hooves if the ritual sacrifice of the festival isn't performed.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
